title: Feds demand compromise on Colorado River while states flounder despite water shortage
description: Without a strong winter snow season, it’s possible Lake Powell’s levels could drop low enough to cease hydropower production by next October.
content: Without a strong winter snow season, it’s possible Lake Powell’s levels could drop low enough to cease hydropower production by next October.
